SEARCH
Package com.data.gui

Class MainSceneController

java.lang.Object
com.data.gui.MainSceneController
public class MainSceneController extends Object
Controller class for the main scene in a JavaFX application. This class manages the user interface for searching and displaying cryptocurrency market data.

  • Method Details

    • logout

      public void logout(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException

    • search

      public void search(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the search action when a user searches for market data. Fetches market data and transitions to the CoinDataScene if a valid market is found.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by the search action.
      Throws:
      IOException - if loading the FXML resource fails.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller class. Sets up currency choices and chart scale options, and updates the history display.

    • updateHistoryDisplay

      public void updateHistoryDisplay()
      Updates the display of the history of market data searches.

    • setStage

      public void setStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage)

    • close

      public void close(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
